content.text:
I'll help you warm up by exploring the current directory structure to understand what we're working with.

Let me start by examining the directory contents:

<Bash>
ls -la
</Bash>

The directory appears to be related to the "火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎" which seems to be a Chinese platform for large model experiences from Volcano Engine. Let me get a better view of the directory structure:

<Bash>
find . -type f -name "*" | head -20
</Bash>

Let me also check what types of files are in this directory:

<Bash>
find . -type f | grep -E "\.(html|js|css|json|png|jpg|jpeg|gif|ico)$" | head -10
</Bash>

This looks like a web application or website with various asset files. Let me see if there are any key HTML files:

<Bash>
find . -name "*.html" | head -5
</Bash>

I'm ready for your search requests! I can help you:
- Find specific files using glob patterns
- Search through code with regex patterns
- Read and analyze file contents
- Explore the codebase structure
